attributes.name: compact
attributes.description: Whether or not it is compact

attributes.name: width
attributes.description: The width it switches to compact, in pixels. Must be a number. Default is 990.

classes.name: align-left
classes.description: forces a secondary item to go to the left-most column of the menu dropdown

classes.name: span-2
classes.description: Allows a secondary item to fill up two columns at a time

classes.name: span-3
classes.description: Allows a secondary item to fill up three columns at a time
